List of Open-Source Robot Arm Projects

So many robotic arms to choose from...

By
Joe Norton
— October 06, 2014
DIRECTORY
I wanted to put together a list of existing active robot arm projects so that they were easier to find and take advantage of... There's no reason for everybody for reinvent the wheel over and over again.

Active open-source robotic arm projects, in size order

The MeArm - Pocket Sized Robot Arm
Cost ~$50 (unassembled kit)
Documentation: Instructables
Project Home: PhenOptix
Source Files: Thingiverse
License: CC-BY-SA 3.0
The RARM - Slightly Bigger Than Pocket Sized Robot Arm
(not for sale anywhere, unfinished)
Documentation: none
Project Home: Oomlout
Source Files: Thingiverse
License: CC-BY-SA 3.0
The LiteArm - Desktop Sized Robotic Arm
Cost ~$300 (unassembled kit)
Documentation: none
Project Home: Armatec Group
Source Files: Thingiverse
License: CC-BY-SA 3.0
The uArm - Another Desktop Sized Robotic Arm
Cost ~$300 (unassembled kit)
Documentation: Instructables
Project Home: uFactory
Source Files: UNRELEASED?
License: ???
The Arm3 - Bit Bigger Than Desktop Sized Robotic Arm
Cost ~$270 (unassembled kit)
Documentation: Instructables
Project Home: Marginally Clever
Source Files: Thingaverse
License: CC-BY-SA 3.0

That's it. The end.

Do you have an open-source robot arm that you would like listed? Leave a comment!
